title: IS_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION_VALID
content:
0xE825F6B6CEA7671D0x952ABD9A// IsPedComponentVariationValid
BOOL IS_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION_VALID(Ped ped, int componentId, int drawableId, int textureId);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.componentId: The component id to check the variation of. Refer to SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION.drawableId: The drawable id to get the component variation of. Refer to GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_PROP_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS.textureId: The texture id to get the component variation of. Refer to GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_PROP_TEXTURE_VARIATIONS.Checks if the component variation is valid, this works great for randomizing components using loops.
codeBlocks:
// IsPedComponentVariationValid
BOOL IS_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION_VALID(Ped ped, int componentId, int drawableId, int textureId);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for IS_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION_VALID
IsPedComponentVariationValid(ped, 0, 0, 0)
